text: "Smoky Mountain Rain" is a 1980 song by country singer Ronnie Milsap and was the first and only single from his greatest hits album Greatest Hits. It went to number 24 in the United States and topped the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts. It was reworked in 2019 as a duet with Dolly Parton. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Country songs Category:Ronnie Milsap songs Category:Dolly Parton songs
title: Smoky Mountain Rain
